useless.translation[0].definitions[0].de: not useful or effective in any way
useless.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The doctor concluded that further treatment would be useless.
a website full of useless information
Water had got into the radio, and now it was completely useless.
The map was so out-of-date it was worse than useless.
The land is useless for growing crops.
it is useless to do something
useless.translation[0].definitions[1].de: unable or unwilling to do anything properly
useless.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Don’t ask Tim to fix it. He’s completely useless.
useless.translation[0].note_box[0].secti: From his point of view qualifications are wholly useless.
These flaws could make the software virtually useless in a business environment.
The vehicle proved quite useless on rocky ground.
The book is pretty useless for today's students.
She has a debilitating condition which renders her legs virtually useless.
Salt water flooded into the land making it useless for farming.
Police checkpoints proved useless at stopping the suicide bombers.
It would be worse than useless to try and complain about him.
